DOC.detailed_description: This study examine metabolic effect 3 possible test meal ( Oleogel ) and/or 3 possible test meal ( Grass Jelly ) . The participant option voluntarily choose study part ( ) participate . This study evaluate 40 healthy Chinese male subject general public period one year . Treatments randomize receive 3 different test meal ( Oleogel ) and/or 3 different test meal . Randomization mean assign participant test meal chance , like toss coin roll dice . If participant take part study , participant require come 3 non-consecutive day and/or 5 non-consecutive day evaluate 3 different test meal ( Oleogel ) and/or 3 different test meal ( Grass jelly ) respectively , random order minimum 1 week test session . For session , participant require come 8:00-9:00am , session last approximately 3.5 hour 6.5 hour . The participant would come follow 10-12 hour overnight fast . An indwelling catheter insert vein participant ' forearm remainder test session . The investigator take blood sample cannula measure baseline value . The investigator also take participant 's capillary blood via finger prick measure blood glucose concentration . After obtain baseline blood sample , investigator give participant test meal eat within 10 minute fill 'liking ' questionnaire . Following meal investigator take blood sample ( cannula finger prick ) next 10 , 20 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 150 , 180 , ( treatment 4 , 5 , 6 ) , 210 , 240 , 270 , 300 , 330 , 360 minute ( Treatment 1 , 2 , 3 ) . The amount blood collect every time point 5µL droplet fingerprick approximately 5mL blood cannulation , accumulative amount per test session approximately 50 80 ml , accumulative amount entire study duration approximately 240 mL blood cannula finger prick ( Part A ) 150 ml ( Part B ) . The investigator also ask participant answer questionnaire measurement hunger fullness time blood sample take . The appetite-rating questionnaire consist 100mm continuous line anchor end oppose statement question ask . The specific question ask : 'How hungry feel ? ' , 'How full feel ? ' , How strong desire eat ? ' , 'How much food think eat ? ' 'Do preoccupation thought food right ? ' . Using pen , would make mark line correspond feel . In addition VAS scale , current trial collect information prospective portion participant would like consume range different food different time point ; every 30 minute interval baseline till end test session . This computer base task present range food participant ask `` much food would like consume right ? `` , allow participant move series different portion food select one participant would like consume time base participant ' feeling hunger , fullness desire eat . The food deliberately choose represent common Singaporean meal , dessert snack food regularly eat relieve hunger different situation range portion available across food ( 20-1200 kcals 20 kcal step ) . On evening test session , participant expect come collect standard dinner meal . The participant advise take part strenuous physical activity least 3 day avoid caffeine alcohol consumption day test session . Subjects participation study last maximum 20.5 hour ( Part A ) 11.5 hour ( Part B ) , include one screen visit last around 1 hour .
DOC.criteria: 2140 year Body Mass Index 1825 kg/m2 Body weight equal 45kg Normal blood pressure ( ≤140/90 ) normal fast blood glucose ( < 6.0 mM ) Have major chronic disease heart disease , cancer diabetes mellitus , intolerance allergy test product User insulin drug know affect glucose metabolism body fat distribution People major medical surgical event require hospitalization within precede 3 month Individuals presence disease drug influence digestion absorption nutrient Current smoker People therapeutic diet/drug
